issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Better display for logical plans: Graphviz and Schema information
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10531](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10531). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
  I have been tracking down issues in our use of DataFusion for my work project, and I have found myself wanting to print out the state of the logical_plan several times. The existing debug formatting is ok, but it is missing a few key items:

1. schema information (as in when did columns appear / disappear in the plan)
1. A visual representation (graphviz)
